newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian Treasury offers A$1.5 bln of notes.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian Treasury offers A$1.5 bln of notes.

text.p: The Australian Treasury will offer a total of A$1.5 billion of Treasury notes for tender on Wednesday, the Reserve Bank of Australia said on Tuesday.
The tender comprises A$700 million of five-week notes, A$300 million of 13-week notes and A$500 million of 26-week notes.
The RBA said it would take up an additional A$300 million of five-week, A$100 million of 13-week and A$100 million 26-week notes for its own portfolio.
The Treasury last week offered a total of A$1.2 billion of notes, comprising A$600 million of five-week notes, A$300 million of 13-week notes and A$300 million of 26-week notes.
There are A$700 million of non-official holdings of T-notes maturing in the week ending May 15.
